name: Bizeso Services Private Limited
tag_list: business-partners, entertainment, arts, advertisement, investor, franchise, tender, business-exchange, tradeshow, flock, blog, forum, chat, mailbox, event, video, photo, audio, business-plan, business-meeting, job, idea, press, detective, lawyer, loan, in
overview:
About Bizeso.com

Bizeso Services Pvt. Ltd. has launched bizeso.com, a business, entertainment and social networking website, to provide a wide range of online services to entrepreneurs, businesses, professionals and individuals, connecting them on a more interactive platform. Mr. Manoj Yadav, the founder and CEO of Bizeso Services Pvt. Ltd. founded Bizeso.com to improve the way world communicates as he says,â€ Social media has broken down the boundaries for businesses that have adopted it because it allows companies and their clients to communicate directly and frequently, forming strong relationships. And those businesses which do not get on the social media bandwagon soon will not survive.â€ His primary vision was to build a common platform for business, entertainment and social networking and making sure people have fun while theyâ€™re at it.

Being a one stop portal www.bizeso.com is worldâ€™s biggest portal with more than 3000 web pages. It runs 32 sub-portals under its name, catering to all the business, entertainment and social networking needs. Whether it is business exchange, business partnering, business meeting, business plans, freelancing, insurance, investors & funds, loans, tenders, trade shows, jobs, franchise, press release, art, entertainment, advertisements, portfolios, ideas, blogs, polls, flocks, photo, video & audio sharing, chat, events, detectives, lawyers, shopping, buying or selling, academy, bizeso has it all.

In order to get benefit from all the sections of bizeso.com, users need to register only once with a valid email id and that too without any paid memberships. Users can search business partners for any business across the world and post their partnering needs through bizeso biz partner. Professionals from any field can post their portfolios in a diverse niche for professional portfolios in bizeso entertainment section to showcase their talent and creativity thereby grabbing work order, attention and fan following.

At bizeso art section users can post and exhibit their art pieces, they can also auction and sell their art from a wide variety of art forms like painting, drawing, sculpture, photography etc. Advertisement.bizeso.com lets users post their ads for companies and brands, search ads, create storyboard for ads etc.

Investors can search reliable opportunities, firms and businesses for investing capital according to their investment prospects and those looking for funds can submit their investment proposal and so that they can search and contact angel investors, venture capitalists etc. by posting their requirements at bizeso investors. Users can post and search tenders by products or categories across the globe at tender section to get an insight into market surveys.

Franchise owners can sell franchises at franchise.bizeso.com thereby letting franchise seekers search and buy franchises. Biz exchange segment provides an international platform to all the entrepreneurs and business owners who want to sell or exchange their businesses with a similar or different type of business.

People can post and search all relevant data about upcoming trade shows, can get reviews of recently held trade shows at bizeso trade show. Flock sub portal gives a platform to users of common interests to form a flock and stay connected on their common issues. Blogs can be read, searched and posted at blog portion.

Issues can be discussed at forum section.Various chat rooms are available for group or private chatting at bizeso chat. Mail account is available at mailbox portion. Bizeso event lets its users post, search and share events and send invites for their events.

Users can exhibit their creativity by uploading, sharing and browsing unlimited videos, audios and photos of their interests in various categories at video, audio and photo sections respectively. So there are ample opportunities for people to show their passion and talent.

Bizeso biz plan helps its users to plot in-depth business plans useful for their businesses equally whether they are amateur or established one. Biz meeting section provides platform for scheduling business meetings and inviting members through mail. Recruiters can post vacancies, hire professionals and job seekers can search and apply for jobs at job segment.

Ideas posted on idea.bizeso.com can get funds if investors found them worth of investing so anyone who has great ideas but requires investment to realize them can make use of it. Users can post press releases and build public relations at bizeso press.

Qualified professionals like detectives, lawyers and CA can post their professional profiles at detective, lawyer and CA section respectively for getting work orders and those in need can send inquiries to them or can hire them thereby profiting both the parties.

Loan seekers can post their requirements at bizeso loan and financing bodies will contact them accordingly.All the academic inquiries can be done at academy.bizeso.com. Institutional bodies can register themselves and lead the students.Users can create polls at polls.bizeso.com. With features like these, people can
